TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ItemContainerGenerator extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IItemContainerGenerator, class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IRecyclingItemContainerGenerator, class System.Windows.IWeakEventListener

public ref class ItemContainerGenerator sealed : System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::IRecyclingItemContainerGenerator, System::Windows::IWeakEventListener

summary.span: 代表主机主机生成用户界面 (UI)，例如 。

span.span: Generates the user interface (UI) on behalf of its host, such as an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现，这是定义一种类型的接口的： implements , which is the interface that defines a type which: - 如维护多个项控件的数据视图之间的关联和相应项。Maintains an association between the data view of a multiple-item control, such as and the corresponding items. - 生成代表多个项控件的项。Generates items on behalf of a multiple-item control. 每个类型都有相应的容器类型。Each type has a corresponding container type. 容器元素是包含项集合中的数据项的对象。Container elements are the objects that contain the data items in the item collection. 例如，对于，生成的容器是控件; 有关，它们是控件。For example, for , the generated containers are controls; for , they are controls. 生成通过其项接口。The generates its items through the interface. 属性属于类型，该类实现接口。The property of the is of type , which implements the interface. 因此，你可以访问与关联的对象你使用属性。Therefore, you can access the object associated with your using the property. 例如，如果您有一个数据绑定，并且你想要获取基于其索引或其关联的数据项，你可以使用或方法。For example, if you have a data-bound , and you want to get a based on its index or its associated data item, you can use the or the method. 或者，可以使用或方法以获取与给定的所生成的容器元素关联的索引或数据的项。Alternatively, you can use the or the method to get the index or data item associated with a given generated container element. 除了这些用法接口用于高级方案。Apart from those usages, the interface is used in advanced scenarios. 通常情况下，具有自己的虚拟化的面板的实现的高级应用程序调用该接口的成员。Typically, advanced applications that have their own implementation of a virtualizing panel call members of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承自的类可以使用此方法来获取正确设置生成的属性的对象。A class that inherits from can use this method to get an object that will properly set the generated property. 当方法返回时，属性设置为。When the method returns, property is set to . 当释放此对象时，设置为。When the object is disposed, is set to . 你可以将对象传递给`using`封装你生成项容器的逻辑的语句。You can pass the object to a `using` statement that encapsulates your logic that generates item containers. 当从返回的对象号超出范围，属性将正确设置。When the object returned from goes out of scope, the property will be properly set.
